detail_desc: Shirt in a soft viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves and narrow, buttoned cuffs. Detachable fabric belt with metal rings at the waist, and a rounded hem.
Pleated skirt in patterned satin with visible elastic at the waist and a raw-edge hem. Unlined.
High-heeled mules in soft leather with a wide strap over the foot and narrow toe loop. Square toes, covered heels and leather linings and insoles.

Hi-tops in matt imitation leather with print motifs, a padded shaft and tongue, elasticated lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Adjustable hook and loop tab with a metal D-ring and decorative hanging tab with a text print. Mesh linings and insoles and patterned soles.

Maxi dress in an airy cotton weave with narrow shoulder straps, a double-layered bodice at the front and a concealed zip in one side. Gathered seam under the bust, wide ties at the back, a wide skirt and a large flounce at the hem.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Long-sleeved shirt in a cotton blend with an easy-iron finish. Turn-down collar, classic front, narrow cuffs with adjustable buttoning, darts at the back and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.

CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Calf-length dress in a lightweight jacquard weave made from recycled polyester with a pattern in glittery threads. Deep V-neck front and back, asymmetric seams at the top and a concealed zip at the back. Seam at the hips with small frill trim and a flared, pleated skirt. Recycled polyester lining.
Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a jersey-lined hood. Deep V-neck with lacing at the front, low dropped shoulders and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs. Soft brushed inside.
Trousers in stretch cotton twill with a regular waist, zip fly, side pockets, back pockets and slim, tapered legs with quilted sections at the knees.
Gently tailored jacket in a modal blend with a lightly brushed finish. Notch lapels, welt chest pocket, flap front pockets and no buttons. Lined.
Trainers in cotton with an elastic gore and elasticated lacing at the front. Cotton linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Microfibre thong briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and string back.
Push-up bra in lace and mesh with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Scarf in a soft, fine knit with fringes on the short sides.
Short dress in a viscose weave with a V-neck and ties at the front, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and elasticated seam at the waist. Unlined.
Treggings in sturdy cotton jersey with covered elastication at the waist, a fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Long jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels and flap welt front pockets. Lined.
Top in a soft, ribbed viscose blend with a deep neckline, decorative buttons at the front and short sleeves.
Long-sleeved jumper in a cotton rib knit with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short, fitted dress in stretch jersey made partly from recycled polyester with a deep neckline and wide shoulder straps.
Hipster briefs in cotton jersey with lace trims, a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline.
Soft pile pyjamas. Long-sleeved top with ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Plastic water bottle with a non-drip lid and handle at the top. Capacity 750 ml.
Sandals with wide, crossover straps at the front and an adjustable heel strap with a metal buckle at one side. Imitation leather insoles.
Brazilian briefs in microfibre and lace with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and high cut at the back.
Top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with a wrapover funnel collar, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Straight-cut jacket in a crêpe weave with notch lapels and long sleeves. No fasteners. Unlined.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Trousers in woven fabric with a high paper bag waist, side pockets, detachable tie belt and tapered legs.

Lightly padded parka in soft cotton twill with a pile-lined hood with a detachable faux fur trim, and a zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front. Handwarmer pockets with a press-stud, patch front pockets with a flap and press-studs, a drawstring at the waist and a concealed drawstring at the hem. Ribbing at the cuffs and a single back vent. Partly lined in pile.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Trousers in a cotton weave with a lightly brushed finish. Regular waist, a concealed hook-and-eye fastening, zip fly, side pockets and welt back pockets with a button. Adjustable tab with buttons at the sides and gently tapered, ankle-length legs.
Hat in a soft cable knit with a rib-knit hem.

Calf-length dress in a patterned, gently crêped weave with a V-neck and a gathered seam below the bust with narrow trims. Elasticated seam at the back, gathered seams at the shoulders and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Slit at the front. Unlined.
Fully-fashioned trainers with elastication around the opening, lacing at the front and a loop with a rubber print at the back. Mesh insoles, and EVA (ethylene-vinyl acetate) and rubber soles.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a frill trim at the front, low waist, narrow ties at the sides and high cut at the back.
Short shorts in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and slits in the sides.
Bikini bottoms and a swim top in UV-protective fabric. Top with short raglan sleeves and a small stand-up collar. Fully lined bikini bottoms. UPF 50.
Vest top in jersey crêpe with scalloped trims.
Metal keyring with an imitation leather strap and small carabiner hook with a charm. Detachable strap with a metal clip lock. Total length 50 cm.
Short dress in linen and viscose twill with a V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the front, concealed zip at the back and a seam with a decorative buckle at the waist. Lined.

Parka in washed cotton twill with an appliqué, detachable, lined hood, stand-up collar and a zip down the front. Welt chest pocket, flap patch front pockets with a hook and loop fastening and a drawstring at the waist. Elasticated cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
Fitted, long-sleeved top in a soft rib knit.
Jumper in a textured cotton knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Elastic bracelets in various designs.

Oxford cotton shirt with a button-down collar, classic front and open chest pocket. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke with a pleat and hanger at the back and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Sleeveless dress in jersey with a seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Jumper in a soft, textured-knit cotton blend containing some wool with small, rib-knit flounces over the shoulders and stocking-stitched sleeves.

Knee-length dress in mesh with a flock-print pattern. Round neckline with a small opening and button at the back of the neck, and 3/4-length puff sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Gathered seam at the waist and hem for added width and soft draping. Jersey underdress.

Microfibre body with a gentle sculpting effect on the waist and bum. Adjustable shoulder straps and padded cups to shape the bust and provide good support. Lined gusset with press-studs and a high cut at the back with folded, glued edges. Mesh lining at the front.
Blouse in woven fabric with a collar and buttons down the front. Double-layered yoke with gathers at the shoulders and back, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.

Ankle-length jumpsuit in woven fabric with notch lapels, short cap sleeves and concealed pockets in the side seams. Seam at the waist with a drawstring at the front and elastication at the back, and wide, straight legs.
Shorts in soft cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets and a fake jetted back pocket with a button.

Trousers in a soft rib knit containing some wool. High waist with covered elastication and wide, straight legs with narrow, ribbed trims at the hems. The polyester content of the trousers is recycled.
Football shirt in fast-drying functional fabric with a print motif front and back. Short raglan sleeves ending in a double layer in a contrasting colour.

Lined, bandeau bikini top with side support and cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. No fasteners. The polyester content of the outer fabric is partly recycled. The polyester content of the lining is recycled.

Bomber jacket in woven fabric with a print motif front and back. Small, ribbed stand-up collar, a zip down the front, diagonal side pockets and a zipped sleeve pocket. Visible, gathered seams down the sleeves, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.

Short dress in a viscose weave with lined cups and a sweetheart neckline with a small frill trim. Short puff sleeves with elastication over the shoulders and at the hems, smocking at the back and a concealed zip in one side. Seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Glasses with plastic frames and clear lenses.
Metal earrings with a hoop and oval pendant. Diameter approx. 2.8 cm, length approx. 4 cm.
Jumpsuit in woven fabric with a slightly wider neckline, seam at the waist and a soft belt. Concealed zip at the back, side pockets and straight, wide legs. Lined bodice.
Long-sleeved top in a rib knit with a soft, brushed finish.
Scarf in an airy linen weave with fringes on the short sides. Size 90x180 cm.
Long-sleeved dress in soft, fine-knit cotton with a sequined motif at the top. Seam at the hips and a lined, flared skirt in two layers of tulle, the top layer with glittery spots.

Softshell jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with a detachable fleece-lined hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front. Zipped side pockets, ribbed cuffs and reflective details. Soft brushed inside.
Shorts in stretch, printed denim with covered elastication at the waist, fake front pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Short-sleeved, fitted jersey top with a slightly deeper neckline.
Short skirt in a crêpe weave with a high paper bag waist, detachable tie belt, pleats at the top and buttons down the front. Lined.
Top in viscose jersey with a V-neck front and back and spaghetti shoulder straps. Jersey lining.
Trousers in an airy weave with an elasticated waist, side pockets and straight, wide legs.
Bras in microfibre and mesh with underwired, padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
5-pocket trousers in washed, superstretch twill with a regular waist, zip fly and button and slim legs.
Scarf in a soft loose weave with fringes on the short sides. Size 80x200 cm.
Prolong the life of your favourite jeans. Mend, patch and continue to love them. Fabric patches in various jeans washes that can be ironed on. Size 11x14cm.

Baby Exclusive. All-in-one suit in soft organic cotton jersey with buttons down the front, long raglan sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a seam at the waist. Side pockets, a patch back pocket with a decorative button, concealed fastenings at the crotch and down the legs and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Short, straight tunic in sturdy, patterned slub jersey made from a cotton blend. Dropped shoulders and cap sleeves with a frill.

Soft, non-wired bra in lace and microfibre with lined, triangular cups that give the bust a natural shape and light support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps, a wide lace trim at the hem and a wide strap with three pairs of hooks and eyes at the back.
